pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``nose-pattern-exclude``########################A simple nose plugin that allows for excluding directories and filesfrom test discovery by path or glob pattern. Inspired by`nose-exclude <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/nose-exclude>`_.Installation============.. code-block:: bash $ pip install nose-pattern-excludeUsage=====.. code-block:: bash $ nosetest \ --exclude-path=./stuff \ --exclude-path=/code/morestuff.py \ --exclude-path=app/api/v?/*/tests.py
